text: Gun of a Preacher Man is a live album of Amen, released August 2, 2005 by Snapper / Secret Records. The album is a recording of a February 1, 2003 show in Manchester, England. ==Track list== All tracks recorded February 1, 2003 in Manchester. ==References== Category:2005 live albums Category:Amen (American band) albums
title: Gun of a Preacher Man
